mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.pw, c.name, c.nickname, c.phone, c.address, c.email, a.reservation_num, a.store_id, a.reservation_date, a.reservation_time, a.person_num, b.review_num, b.content, b.image, b.star, b.review_date FROM reservation a JOIN review b ON a.reservation_num = b.reservation_num JOIN customer c ON a.customer_id = c.id WHERE a.store_id = #{param1}
